Description: Papyrus. Demotic letter. Recto: 7 lines; verso: one line address (very faded).
Curator's comments: Sender is Dhutymen. The text contains two separate letters. It is dated to year 13 of an unnamed ruler. Early demotic. Being studied for publication by Cary J Martin.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (107428) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/107428)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: brittle, discoloured, fractured, fragile Black ink Tabbed: kraft paper, court plaster Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: self adhesive tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair
Acquisition name: Purchased through: B A Seaby Ltd
